feed.title: Fladder Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Fladder: v0.5.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Updated translations

Other Changes

  • chore: Update to latest windows runner by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/170
  • chore: Updated translations from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/169

Full Changelog: https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/compare/v0.5.0...v0.5.1

entry.title: New release for Fladder: v0.5.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

Exciting New Features üèï

  • feat(Desktop): Added double tap full-screen support by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/178
  • feature: Details screen rework by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/190
  • feature: Save logging to cache directory by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/196

Bugfixes üêû

  • fix: WakeLock calls now get called properly by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/177
  • fix(Desktop): Input no longer passed through titlebar by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/179
  • fix: Fix trick play overflow by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/186
  • fix: Disabling switching router layouts after init by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/191
  • fix: Synced episode information not loading by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/192
  • fix: Drag with mouse switch by @bazzadazza72 in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/195

Other Changes

  • chore: Updated translations from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/171
  • chore: Remove version attribute from docker-compose.yml by @bazzadazza72 in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/182
  • chore: Added simple option to view/copy crash-logs locally by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/185

Full Changelog: https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/compare/v0.5.1...v0.5.2

entry.title: New release for Fladder: v0.6.0
entry.content:
This release includes a lot of feature requests and bugfixes. Thank you to @bazzadazza72 for creating a Windows installer

What's Changed

Exciting New Features üèï

  • feature(web): Added option to download file and copy stream url by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/209
  • feature: Rework responsive layout by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/217
  • feature: More info playback state by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/219
  • feature: Create Windows installer by @bazzadazza72 in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/222
  • feature: Improve episode status indicators by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/229
  • feature: Video quality options by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/234
  • feature: Version selection by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/235
  • feature: Add actions for media segments by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/236

Bugfixes üêû

  • fix: Over-sharpened images from filter quality by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/208
  • fix: STRM files not playing correctly by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/210
  • fix(Desktop): Simplified full-screen/maximize behaviour by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/211
  • fix: Media-control pausing of media by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/213
  • fix: Hide duplicate floating player in phone layout by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/218
  • fix: Incorrect playback reporting by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/221
  • fix: Improve null handling when parsing image urls by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/228
  • fix: Properly parse null values api by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/230

Other Changes

  • chore: Update flutter -> 3.27.0 and packages by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/201
  • chore: Updated translations from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/199

Full Changelog: https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/compare/v0.5.2...v0.6.0

entry.title: New release for Fladder: v0.6.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

A small update to include the latest translations üéâ. Huge thanks to all the translators for their contributions‚Äîpast, present, and future! This update also includes a few minor bug fixes.

Exciting New Features üèï

  • feature: Linux AppImage package by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/245

Bugfixes üêû

  • fix: Improved and fixed some of the videoPlayer controls by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/241
  • fix: Hide subtitles with empty text by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/242
  • fix: Web full-screen functionality
  • fix: Remove window buttons in web version

Other Changes

  • chore: Updated translations from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/238

Full Changelog: https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/compare/v0.6.0...v0.6.1

entry.title: New release for Fladder: v0.6.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

Also a lot of mobile fixes, specifically some performance issues caused by using shadows with the new impeller flutter engine. Translation updates Other small bugfixes

Exciting New Features üèï

  • feature: improve corner radius subtitle background by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/298
  • feature: Add guest actors to episode view by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/299
  • feature(PhotoViewer): Keep screen alive during slideshow by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/305

Bugfixes üêû

  • fix(Desktop/Web): Mouse not hiding and controls not appearing (web) by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/307
  • fix: Windows media controls by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/297
  • fix: Show any enabled libraries in home screen by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/300

Other Changes

  • chore: Updated flutter to 3.29.2 + bugfixes by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/296
  • chore: Move to different iconsax library by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/301
  • chore: Updated translations from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/253
  • fix: Small bugfixes by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/303
  • Chore/upgrade packages by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/304

Full Changelog: https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/compare/v0.6.1...v0.6.2
